name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】『Neverland Paradox』 Ninomae Ina'nis Birthday Live 2023 #INAinaNeverland [yT2ety9RfIo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Ninomae Ina'nis performs the song 'This is the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee.' on a futuristic 3D stage with hexagonal elements and a view of Earth from space.
scenes.song_name: This is the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee.

subtitles.original: こちら、幸福安心委員会です。
subtitles.english: This is the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee.

subtitles.original: Lyrics: 鳥居羊 / Composition: うたたP
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Torii Hitsuji / Composition: Utata-P

subtitles.original: 飛ばして みんなが幸せなの
subtitles.english: Soar away, everyone is happy

subtitles.original: この世界のこと
subtitles.english: About this world

subtitles.original: 聞きたいって 知りたいって
subtitles.english: I want to hear, I want to know

subtitles.original: 水辺の公園で みんなが耳を澄ませて
subtitles.english: In the park by the water, everyone listens closely

subtitles.original: ワクワクするね ねえ、オンディーヌ
subtitles.english: It's exciting, isn't it, Ondine?

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: さあさあ、皆さん 教えてあげます
subtitles.english: Now then, everyone, I'll tell you

subtitles.original: 皆が気になっていること
subtitles.english: What everyone is curious about

subtitles.original: 疑問に思っていること 全部教えてあげます
subtitles.english: What everyone is wondering, I'll tell you all

subtitles.original: えー、皆さんが幸福なのは義務なんです
subtitles.english: Well, it is your duty to be happy

subtitles.original: 幸せですか？
subtitles.english: Are you happy?

subtitles.original: 義務ですよ？
subtitles.english: It is your duty.

subtitles.original: 果たしてますか？
subtitles.english: Are you fulfilling it?

subtitles.original: 我々幸福安心委員会は
subtitles.english: We, the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee,

subtitles.original: 皆様の幸せを願い そして 支えます
subtitles.english: Wish for and support everyone's happiness

subtitles.original: 幸福なのは義務なんです 幸福なのは義務なんです
subtitles.english: It is your duty to be happy, it is your duty to be happy

subtitles.original: 幸福なのは義務なんです 幸せですか？ 義務ですよ
subtitles.english: It is your duty to be happy, are you happy? It is your duty.

subtitles.original: ですから 安心してお任せなさいね
subtitles.english: So, please leave it to us with peace of mind

subtitles.original: 皆様の幸せが 我々の幸せ
subtitles.english: Everyone's happiness is our happiness

subtitles.original: 幸せですか？ 義務ですよ
subtitles.english: Are you happy? It is your duty.

subtitles.original: 果たしてますか？
subtitles.english: Are you fulfilling it?

subtitles.original: 幸せじゃないなら...
subtitles.english: If you are not happy...

subtitles.original: 絞首 斬首 銃殺 釜茹で 溺死 電撃 火あぶり 究明
subtitles.english: Hanging, beheading, shooting, boiling, drowning, electrocution, burning, investigation

subtitles.original: 埋殺 薬殺 石打ち 鋸 磔
subtitles.english: Burying alive, lethal injection, stoning, sawing, crucifixion

subtitles.original: 好きなのを選んでね
subtitles.english: Please choose whichever you like

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: さあさあ、皆さん 幸せだけにしてます
subtitles.english: Now then, everyone, I'm making you only happy

subtitles.original: 不安とかも 何も無いでしょう？
subtitles.english: You don't have any anxiety or anything, right?

subtitles.original: 怖い...
subtitles.english: I'm scared...

subtitles.original: 怖いわ...
subtitles.english: I'm scared...

subtitles.original: 幸せすぎて 怖いわ
subtitles.english: I'm so happy, I'm scared

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: さあさあ、皆さん 死にました
subtitles.english: Now then, everyone, they died

subtitles.original: 王様に背いた者は 死にました
subtitles.english: Those who defied the King died

subtitles.original: 葬儀に出るなら 向こうに並べ
subtitles.english: If you're attending the funeral, line up over there

subtitles.original: それ以外は 幸せに暮らせ
subtitles.english: Otherwise, live happily

subtitles.original: 以上！ 幸福なのは義務なんです
subtitles.english: That is all! It is your duty to be happy

subtitles.original: 義務なんです 義務ですよ 義務なんです
subtitles.english: It is your duty, it is your duty, it is your duty

subtitles.original: 幸福なのは義務なんです
subtitles.english: It is your duty to be happy

subtitles.original: 義務なんです 義務ですよ 義務なんです
subtitles.english: It is your duty, it is your duty, it is your duty

subtitles.original: 幸せじゃないなら...
subtitles.english: If you are not happy...

subtitles.original: 死ね
subtitles.english: Die.
